attributes.description: A Stunning Luxury SUV With Exceptional Comfort And Loads Of Space. Our 2018 Model Is Presented In Silver With A Black Leather Interior. Features Include A Panoramic Glass Sunroof, Front And Rear Park Distance Control, LED Headlights, Digital Cluster, Multi Functional Steering Wheel With Paddle Shift, Satellite Navigation, Bluetooth, CD Shuttle With SD Input, Climate Control, Anti Smash And Grab Window Tint, Aluminium Roof Rail, Electric Tailgate, Electric Towbar, And 17 Inch Alloy Wheels. With It's Fantastic Fuel Efficiency This Vehicle Will Bring You Many Miles Of Pleasure. Call Us Today. Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted.
